message.body: Apparently this chat Zite has the most peers among [all the known ones](http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroChatrooms.bit)
Why is it still so silent?
@tkarita@zid  0net://1KuwNEQXaF7SmAibxLs2wgJQJjGYTDMErc/ says "No peers found"

@freekazoid@zid:@flyman@zid is right. Even if you argue against, them you give them attention and this way you support them in a way. The best tactics is ignoring hate speech and fill the communication platform with something else. Fore example, with positive ideas.
@flyman@zid would you like to play chess here?
"Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results." -- Willie Nelson

@tkarita@zid both books http://127.0.0.1:43110/1EmfJvSsZWtikUqWnHbhMQ9yV5ATUBEooc/ and http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KuwNEQXaF7SmAibxLs2wgJQJjGYTDMErc/ loads perfectly. Thank you for the good books and good luck to your ZeroNet library project.
flyman@zid: does that site requires registration and logging in... I'm too lazy for that.. let's play chess here! I start: e4.
@flyman@zid: I'm serious. Install a chess program as Dream Chess where you can save/load games or take out a real chess board.
I really think it will be more fun to play chess here.
Others ZeroNet users can kibitz that way. The average activity is quite low here, anyway.
@tkarita@zid: Until then wouldn't you like to play here?
@tkarita@zid: I've just did that.
Pandam (http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PANDAML8mLaRKPinGihTj5RkJV15awcjs/) is too difficult for me. 56 is my best score...
@tkarita@zid: We can play chess here really slowly, moves can even take days... I'm even curious to see if it would work at all in practice.
@flyman@zid: Okay, let's play on https://en.lichess.org.
I got a network error. Still trying to figure out why.
I think the spectator is me in an other browser =)
@flyman@zid: I can play now. I started a game and someboy joind before I was able to copy the link here. However, I think I become spectator on the link you sent because there I cannot make a move.
It was not me... I got network error again :-/
I can and do inspect your game. The mean while I try to figure out why I get the Network Error mesages.
I get them also during watching your game, too.
@flyman@zid: Without an account I can only create realtime games... maybe it is true for playing too...
/me gives up understanding why https://en.lichess.org is not working.
@flyman@zid: Computing becomes more and more mysterious...
@flyman@zid: I had the impression that the reversi game there is difficult to play.
@flyman@zid: Let's hope the someone or owner of 0net://164KTePHASdAB4o24XEZw1peQtwyjmFQxF/ will improve/simplify the game that way.
@flyman@zid: Have you told your improvement idea to the Zite owner?
@tkarita@zid: Thanks for the link http://shapecatcher.com/.
Do you LaTeX? If yes, then you might like the similar site: http://detexify.kirelabs.org/classify.html
Using LaTeX is easy (after enough practice).
@tkarita@zid: I heard about lyx but I prefer directly editing the tex files (using emacs ;-).
